desc: We are a family-run artisan cheesemaking business using pasteurised goats milk and a smokery business based on the Isle of Anglesey. We traditionally kiln-smoke our products using oak and other hardwoods. We are passionate about the quality and taste of our Welsh smoked produce.

layout.text: Cors Yr Odyn Farm, Dulas, Anglesey, LL70 9DX

Artisan Welsh Goats Cheese Producers Since 2006
Quality Welsh Smoked Food Producers Since 2014
Welsh Goat Meat Producers Since 2020
